ygData.subject: Re: Duel (was: L46 weapon effectiveness.)
ygData.msgSnippet: In PVP I d sing VoV, I think the speedup is the same as warsong (sad huh?) but it s buffs are a bit better My combo for fighting a melee class PVP:  (just
ygData.messageBody:
In PVP I'd sing VoV, I think the speedup is the same as warsong (sad huh?)
but it's buffs are a bit better

My combo for fighting a melee class PVP: (just substitute VoV for Warsong
since you're 50 and Nivs for Healing)

Warsong, HoR, Psalm... (I will choose the appropriate Psalm based on the
most frequently used weapon/proc)
I throw in a cancel magic on THEM a couple times to knock out any and all of
their buffs. Meanwhile mine are constantly refreshed. They tear themselves
up on my dmg shields while I am constantly healing myself as well as hurting
them.

Works pretty well, don't bother using Chain till they're below 50% health.
I dunno if anyone else has noticed but things seem to get resisted less when
someone/thing is below 50% health.

----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2000 11:23 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Duel (was: L46 weapon effectiveness.)


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>
> would warsong or VoV be better in a solo situation? i ask because last
> night i finally won my first duel against a melee class (without kiting or
> running, i stand up to them!). out of 4 duels, i won 2. he's a level 50
> rogue in my guild, full hateplane armor, crystalline spear, vexthorne,
bone
> razor, cloak of flames, badass rogue by all accounts. obviously not a
huge
> amount of hit points, but a massive damage dealer. and i have full hate
> armor and weps, for comparison. anyway, i never thought to play warsong.
i
> played VoV instead. being level 50 he resisted a lot of songs i tried to
> hit him with, so i stuck to buffing myself. when cessation or chains did
> hit him tho, he was noticeably slower, but even with only 45 MR, just
being
> level 50 he resisted too much to help. first tried instrument only
attack,
> but like i said he resisted too much. second i played VoV/Niv's and tried
> to slow him, again he resisted but i won with 36hp left. third time he
got
> some lucky backstabs in, and he also got too close when i dirged and i hit
> us both. 4th time was the best, i played VoV/Niv's and with psalm of
> cooling he tore himself up on the dmg shield. won with 246 hp left.
also,
> i have joined the AC bandwagon. still have my 4 primary stats over 100
(str
> 130, dex 117, agi 110, cha 113) and i hit 801 AC and 1314 hp unbuffed.
what
> can i say i'm a tank in a bard's body.
>
> Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L41 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> >
> > - Yes, you can use Chain and Warsong to get an equivalent to a
> > 56% haste (1.3*1.2) relative to the mob.
>
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...
